item.title: MaiaTest
item.description: Test post. Use the command xxxx hugo new blog/title.md and more

item.title: A python solar logger and monitor
item.description: Summary Still a work in progres. Solar monitor mainly written in python running on Raspberry Pi. The idea is to only use local devices (no external server): Raspberri Pi as local server and ESP's as nodes.

item.title: A solar power optimizer
item.description: Summary Still a work in progres. The idea is to monitor the solar generation and load scheduling and, based on the prediction, optimize the scheduleling of the high power loads, e.g. geyser and pool pump. The idea is to only use local devices (no external server): Raspberri Pi as local server and ESP's as nodes.
